#include <iostream>
    #include <cstdlib>
    #include <cstdio>
    #include <cmath>
     
    using namespace std;
     
    bool prime[1000001];
    unsigned long long sum[1000001];
     
    void func()
    {
    for ( register int i = 2 ; i < 1000001 ; i++ )
    prime[i] = true;
     
    prime[0] = prime[1] = 0;
    sum[0]= sum[1] = 0 ;
     
    unsigned int until= (unsigned int)sqrt((double)(1000001));
     
    for( register int i = 2 ; i <= until ; i++ )
    {
    if( prime[i] == true )
    {
    for(register int j = i ; j*i < 1000001 ; j++)
    {
    prime[i*j]=false;
    }
    }
    }
    for(register int i = 2 ; i < 1000001 ; i++ )
    {
    if( prime[i] == true )
    {
    sum[i] = sum[i-1] + i ;
    }
    else
    {
    sum[i] = sum[i-1];
    }
    }
    }
    int main()
    {
    //ifstream cin("a.in");
    func() ;
    unsigned t ;
    scanf("%u",&t);
    while( t-- )
    {
    unsigned n ;
    scanf("%u",&n);
    cout << sum[n-1] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
    }
